text: Zahid Hasanis a Bangladeshi actor and television director.He has worked in many popular TV shows in Bangladesh. ==Personal Life== Zahid Hasan born in Sirajgonj, Bangladesh.Zahid Hasan is married to Sadia Islam Mou, a Bangladeshi model and actress. They have two children. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi actors
title: Zahid Hasan
